summary: This is an internal appointment reminder for a weekly Complex SHU (Special Housing Unit) meeting at a Federal Correctional Institution. It notes a schedule change for August 6, 2019, due to a conflicting monthly Department Head meeting. The document is an administrative communication from the Warden's Office.

events.title: Complex SHU Meeting (Rescheduled)
events.description: The weekly Complex Special Housing Unit meeting, normally held on Wednesdays, was rescheduled to Tuesday due to the monthly Complex Department Head Meeting occurring on the first Wednesday of the month.

keyFacts: The document is an internal administrative appointment reminder for prison staff.
It schedules a Complex SHU (Special Housing Unit) meeting for August 6, 2019.
It indicates the meeting was moved from its normal Wednesday slot because the first Wednesday of the month is reserved for a Department Head Meeting.
The document originates from the Secretary of the Warden's Office at a Federal Correctional Institution.
The document contains a standard sensitivity warning for official government communications.
